 2003-04612003-04-03,  ,  ,  ND, 
ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 59 - which (a) DECLARES the severe flooding and ice damage which occured in Newfoundland and Labrador in the month of February, 2003, to be of concern to the federal government, and (b) AUTHORIZES the provision of financial assistance in that regard.
